Name: Charente White Negroni
Ingredients: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare pink grapefruit zest for garnish.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Express pink grapefruit zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A riff on the White Negroni with the brandy replacing half of the gin. Fittingly, 'Charente' references the Cognac area of France.
History: Created in January 2014 by Matthias Lataille and yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Charente White Negroni contains 162 calories
